body: This spell functions like create undead, except that you can create more powerful and intelligent sorts of undead: shadows, wraiths, spectres, and devourers. The type or types of undead created is based on caster level, as shown below.
description: Creates shadows, wraiths, spectres, or devourers.
level_text: Arcanist: 8; Cleric: 8; Oracle: 8; Shaman: 8; Sorcerer: 8; Warpriest: 8; Wizard: 8

sections.body:
Caster LevelUndead Created
15th or lowerShadow
16th–17thWraith
18th–19thSpectre
20th or higherDevourer
sections.name: Caster Level

name: Create Greater Undead
